sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhǒng zhíwù fēnbù zài nánfāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette plante est répartie dans le sud.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This plant is distributed in the south.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这对他来说是一个很大的负担。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè duì tā lái shuō shì yī gè hěn dà de fùdān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un lourd fardeau pour lui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a heavy burden for him.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zuò qiáo de gòuzào hěn fùzá.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La structure de ce pont est très complexe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The structure of this bridge is very complex.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā chuān yīfu hěn jiǎngjiu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle est très soignée dans sa façon de s'habiller.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is very particular about her clothing.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这次失败给了我很大的教训。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè cì shībài gěi le wǒ hěn dà de jiàoxun.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet échec m'a donné une grande leçon.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This failure taught me a big lesson.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de sūnnǚ jīnnián wǔ suì le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Sa petite-fille a cinq ans cette année.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His granddaughter is five years old this year.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shān shàng de kōngqì hěn xīnxiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'air en montagne est très frais.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The air in the mountains is very fresh.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā méiyǒu shēngqì, fǎn'ér xiào le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il ne s'est pas fâché, au contraire il a ri.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He didn't get angry, instead he laughed.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de dòngzuò fēicháng kuài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ses mouvements sont très rapides.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His movements are very fast.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ de kuàidì dào le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon colis est arrivé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My express delivery has arrived.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng liáng yīxià nǐ de tǐwēn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez prendre votre température.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please measure your temperature.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhǐshì wèntí de yī bùfen.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce n'est qu'une partie du problème.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is only part of the problem.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen qù cānguān bówùguǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous allons visiter le musée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We are going to visit the museum.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他的成绩超过了所有人。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de chéngjì chāoguò le suǒyǒu rén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ses résultats ont dépassé tout le monde.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His results surpassed everyone.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā chéngwéi le yī míng yīshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est devenu médecin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He became a doctor.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xūyào yī běn Hànyǔ cídiǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai besoin d'un dictionnaire de chinois.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I need a Chinese dictionary.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dìqiú shì yuán de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La Terre est ronde.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The Earth is round.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gēn tóngxué liànxí duìhuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez pratiquer le dialogue avec vos camarades.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please practice the dialogue with your classmates.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 请总结一下今天的会议内容。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng zǒngjié yīxià jīntiān de huìyì nèiróng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez résumer le contenu de la réunion d'aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please summarize the content of today's meeting.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他在很多方面都很优秀。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài hěn duō fāngmiàn dōu hěn yōuxiù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est excellent dans de nombreux domaines.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is excellent in many aspects.
